create_index_tables module

create_index_tables.create_chapter_tables(scientisst_nb_dir)

Creates a Markdown file in the each chapter directory with a complete index table, comprehending all existing notebooks from that chapter

Parameters

scientisst_nb_dir (string) – Path to the root repository of the ScientISST Notebooks

create_index_tables.create_index_tables(scientisst_nb_dir)

Calls necessary fucntions to create a Master Index Table and an Index Table for each chapter.

Parameters

scientisst_nb_dir (string) – Path to the root repository of the ScientISST Notebooks

create_index_tables.create_master_table(scientisst_nb_dir)

Creates a Markdown file in the ScientISST Notebooks repository with a complete index table, comprehending all existing notebooks

Parameters

scientisst_nb_dir (string) – Path to the root repository of the ScientISST Notebooks

create_index_tables.create_new_course_md(md_path, index_table)

[Summary] :param [ParamName]: [ParamDescription], defaults to [DefaultParamVal] :type [ParamName]: [ParamType](, optional) … :raises [ErrorType]: [ErrorDescription] … :return: [ReturnDescription] :rtype: [ReturnType]

create_index_tables.get_NB_info_from_chapter(md_file, dir, master_table=True)

Finds notebooks in a directory, collects relevant information from each, and writes it on the MasterTable document.

Parameters

  • md_file – Markdown file

  • dir (string) – Path to a chapter directory in ScientISST Notebooks

create_index_tables.update_courses_tables(scientisst_nb_dir)

Goes through every course program and updates the metadata from the corresponding notebooks :param courses_dir: Path to the ‘_Courses’ folder :type courses_dir: string
